torch_geometric.transforms.RootedEgoNetsÔÉÅ

class RootedEgoNets(num_hops: int)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: RootedSubgraph

Collects rooted \(k\)-hop EgoNets for each node in the graph, as described in the ‚ÄúFrom Stars to Subgraphs: Uplifting Any GNN with Local Structure Awareness‚Äù paper.

Parameters:

num_hops (int) ‚Äì the number of hops \(k\).
